source.scriptUri: Base URI of a storage append blob(without SAS token) OR SAS URI with read access.

scriptUriManagedIdentity.objectId: GUID. Needed only when scriptUri does not contain SAS token and user-assigned managed Identity is used. Use empty scriptManagedIdentity for system-assigned managed identity.

properties.outputBlobUri: Base URI of a storage append blob(without SAS token) OR SAS URI with read, append, create, write access.
properties.errorBlobUri: Base URI of a storage append blob(without SAS token) OR SAS URI with read, append, create, write access.

outputBlobManagedIdentity.clientId: GUID. Needed only when outputBlobUri does not contain SAS token and user-assigned managed Identity is used. Use empty outputBlobManagedIdentity (like errorBlobManagedIdentity in this example) for system-assigned managed identity.

properties.outputBlobUri: Base URI of a storage append blob(without SAS token)
properties.errorBlobUri: Base URI of a storage append blob(without SAS token)

properties.outputBlobUri: Base URI of a storage append blob(without SAS token)
properties.errorBlobUri: Base URI of a storage append blob(without SAS token)
